name: Hero Jump Quest - 3D Arcade Hopper Game
name_original: Hero Jump Quest - 3D Arcade Hopper Game
description:
Welcome to the super world of Fantasy Addictive Jumping Action with Wizards, Warriors and Strange Creatures. Your village is being raided with Strange Creatures from Halloween Land so it is up to you to reach the Magic Kingdom and Save Your Village.

Many characters to unlock in this Magic World of Knights, Dwarfs, Elfs, Magicians, Giants, Trolls, Great Warriors of Might and Barbarians! This is a Jumpy Characters World so Be quick to tap and jump over obstacles.

Game Features

Intuitive Game play with easy one touch character Control.
Game Center with Leaderboards
Addictive Gameplay with Designed Levels and 19 unlockable characters.
Coin Collect Madness with addictive hopping action.
Race your Score with other players around the world and be the greatest hopper.
Endless Platformer Game With Lots of Action.
